mapper.sql: hid, receiptCode, loadStation, StartCarryDate, DealStation, ArriveDate, did, billState
mapper.insert: insert into freightreceipt (hid, receiptCode, loadStation, StartCarryDate, DealStation, ArriveDate, did, billState) values (#{hid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loadstation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startcarrydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dealstation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrivedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{billstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

hid,
receiptCode,
loadStation,

did,
billState,

mapper.update:
update freightreceipt
receiptCode = #{receiptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loadStation = #{loadstation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
StartCarryDate = #{startcarrydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DealStation = #{dealstation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ArriveDate = #{arrivedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER},
billState = #{billstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where hid = #{hid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
